interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Operation.FilterStatus
interface.description: Interface for determining the status of filters

property.name: FilterInfo
property.description: Holds static information about the filter. Should become const in release 16.04

property.name: FilterLifeRemaining
property.description: Lifespan Remaining in percentage (100 - 0). 0 indicates replace/clean. A simple device may just implement 100/0 or 100/orderPercentage/0 instead of implementing the entire range of values

struct.name: FilterData
struct.description: Static property provides the filter ordering information. Url can be just a domain or a complete URL to the exact filter. Any portion may be blank.

field.name: filterNumber
field.description: FilterNumber starts at 0 and increases for each instance of filter interface on a bus object. It is used to destinguish between two otherwise identical filters.

field.name: FilterLifespanDays
field.description: Day a new filter will last. Used to convert percentage into days remaining. If 0xFFFF there is no predicted life. If 0 the life is less than 1 day

field.name: IsCleanable
field.description: This is a static property of the filter. If the property is true a new filter does not need to be ordered, just clean.

field.name: orderPercentage
field.description: If non-zero the lifetime percentage at which ordering is recommended. If 0 filter is cleanable and there is no reason to order, or no order signal is available. For example simple psid switch.

field.name: filterManufacturer
field.description: Identification of the filter manufacturer, which along with the part number act as a tuple to identify the filter withing the Alljoyn device Either one or both may be a null string.

field.name: filterUrl
field.description: Url can be just a domain or a complete URL to the exact filter. It may provide additionl information of a site for ordering. A null string is acceptable.
